#labels Documentation
*Encryption process*

{{{
<?php 
require_once 'Crypt.class.php'; 
 
$Crypt = new Crypt(CRYPT_MODE_BINARY, CRYPT_HASH_SHA1);
$Crypt->Key = 'MY_PERSONAL_CRYPT_KEY'; 
echo $Crypt->Encode('myvalue'); 
?>
}}}

*Hash process*

{{{
<?php 
require_once 'Crypt.class.php'; 
 
$Crypt = new Crypt(CRYPT_MODE_BINARY, CRYPT_HASH_SHA1);
$Crypt->Key = 'MY_PERSONAL_CRYPT_KEY';
echo $Crypt->Hash('myvalue'); 
?>
}}}
